content: Ruiyuan Li (李瑞远) | 康瑞部落 康瑞部落 一箫一剑走江湖，千古情愁酒一壶。双脚踏翻尘世路，以天为盖地为庐。 About Me About Blog Post List Released Data 欢迎辞 欢迎来到“康瑞部落”! 如果您是第一次来到本站，建议访问“关于部落”以便更快地了解本站。 如果您还不了解我，建议访问“关于我”以便我们更好地交流。 分类导航 数据库 (5)git (2)时空数据 (50)数据 (4)分布式 (13)maven (4)eclipse (2)java (6)HBase (3)程序远读论文 (6)数学 (2)python (3)机器学习 (4)Azure (21)云计算 (22)多线程 (4)计算机网络 (1)Linux (4)《算法竞赛入门经典》 (1)读书笔记 (1)移动开发 (1)系统案例 (1)程序远的音乐梦 (15)程序远面试笔记 (8)oj (203)C#/.NET (57)工具/软件使用技巧 (48)胡诌 (2)windows (13)shell (1)SqlServer (13)算法 (15)录制视频 (1)mysql (5)c/c++ (209)网络小说 (1)金庸小说 (2)计算机转载 (9)转载美文 (9)php (9)网站开发 (5)javascript (8)诗词曲赋 (1)部落系统 (4) 最新评论 Kangry[博主] 在 Ruiyuan Li (李瑞远) 说： 2024-12-11 13:58 主页中有邮箱哈，欢迎邮件联系。 贺陈浪 在 Ruiyuan Li (李瑞远) 说： 2024-12-11 10:43 瑞远哥，我是原京东城市贺陈浪，很高兴在重庆看见你，我也回重庆了，希望瑞远哥留个联系方式，后面继续互相支持工作 邓女士 在 VLDB 2023 | 基于擦除的浮点无损压缩（附论文和源码） 说： 2024-09-11 17:34 123456 Rong Lonely 在 Ruiyuan Li (李瑞远) 说： 2023-06-02 16:02 请问老师的实验室还招博士吗，守elf论文深深启发，想从硕士再读博 李茜茜 在 word公式编辑器插件MathType 说： 2023-03-15 22:14 您好您好，能发一下MathType插件吗？非常感谢 热门文章 Ruiyuan Li (李瑞远) (81519)c#用JObject解析Json (77724)多种序列距离汇总 (64329)京东城市时空数据引擎JUST亮相中国数据库技术大会（附PPT链接） (48142)京东城市时空数据引擎—JUST 如何通过轨迹数据恢复小区路网 (47190)无损时序压缩Elf+：压缩率再提升10%，压缩时间减少20%（附源码） (42661)揭秘京东城市时空数据引擎—JUST如何助力交通流量预测 (25565)vs2013无法创建html，不能发布：The web publishing extension is not installed which is required to publish. He was selected as the most popular teacher among students. He was the Head of Spatio-Temporal Data Group in JD Intelligent Cities Research, leading the research and development of JUST (JD Urban Spatio-Temporal data engine). Before joining JD, he had interned in Microsoft Research Asia from 2014 to 2017. He received the B.E. and M.S. degrees from Wuhan University, China in 2013 and 2016, respectively, and the Ph.D. degree from Xidian University, China in 2020, under the supervisor of IEEE Fellow and ACM Distinguished Scientist Yu Zheng. His research focuses on Spatio-temporal Data Intelligence, Distributed Computing, and Urban Computing. He has published more than 50 refereed papers (including 20+ CCF A papers) that contribute to 3300+ Google Scholar Citations, and applied for over 40 Chinese patents. One of his patents got the China Patent Excellence Award.  He received the Excellent Doctoral Dissertation Award of Shaanxi Computer Society in 2020 and Excellent Doctoral Dissertation Award of Chinese Institute of Electronics in 2022. He won the third prize in CCF Natural Science because of his contribution to spatio-temporal data management and mining. He was awarded as the Spatial Data Intelligence Rising Star in 2025. He is a senior member of CCF (China Computer Federation), Outstanding Technical Committee on Databases of CCF, and Technical Committee on Pervasive Computing of CCF. He is a reviewer of several top-level conferences and journals. JUST system, which he was responsible for, has been successfully deployed in many national projects of China.The greatest advantage of Dr. Ruiyuan Li is that he enjoys the experiences in both of top universities and big enterprises. Whether you are interested in academic research or preparing to work in industry, you can feel free to contact him.There are annually 3~5 postgraduate places opening for dedicated, diligent, down-to-earth and self-motivated students majoring in computer science, GIS or other related majors!Education Experience2016.09 - 2020.08    Ph.D.            Computer Science and Technology      Xidian University, China2013.09 - 2016.06    Master         Computer Software and Theory           Wuhan University, China2009.09 - 2013.06    Bachelor      Computer Science and Technology      Wuhan University, ChinaWork Experience2021.10 - Now        Associate Professor                 Chongqing University, China2018.01 - 2021.10   Researcher/Head of Spatio-Temporal Data Group        JD Intelligent Cities Research, China2014.07 - 2018.01   Research Intern            Microsoft Research AsiaRecent News2025.04.10: I was awarded as the Spatial Data Intelligence Rising Star.2025.03.19: One paper was accepted by Data Science and Engineering.2025.03.18: One paper about floating-point compression was accepted by IoTJ!
